document.full_text: the vatican got a dose of freudian analysis at cannes on friday with "habemus papam," a gentle italian comedy about a newly elected pope who gets cold feet when the weight of his responsibility dawns on him.
document.title: freudian take on vatican life makes cannes smile
lines_and_colors: the vatican got a dose of freudian analysis at cannes on friday with "habemus papam," a gentle italian comedy about a newly elected pope who gets cold feet when the weight of his responsibility dawns on him.
